price: 43 Aucun clan ne put le préserver du châtiment d’Allah dont il ne put lui-même se protéger.
arabic: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walam takun lahu fi-atun yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna muntaṣiran
